scripts.setup: git fetch origin --prune && git reset --hard origin/$(git branch --show-current) && for remote in $(git remote | grep -v '^origin$'); do git remote remove "$remote"; done && uv venv --clear && source .venv/bin/activate
scripts.run: source .venv/bin/activate && npx -y browser-sync start --server site --port 3000 --files 'site/**/*' & cd docs && make livehtml
scripts.archive: cd $CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH && git fetch origin --prune && git reset --hard origin/$(git branch --show-current)
